name: 1st Mission
description:
controls:

c = shoot

x = attack

space, W, up arrow = jump

left click = bomb

WASD+ arrow keys = directions

This game almost didn't meet the game jam deadline because of a huge loss of files. We still some how managed to release something play able though, even if unfinished. We hope you had fun playing this mess of a game, and in case I don't see you have a good morning, good evening, and goodnight!
